entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Source-build behavior control update #27562

Closed

  • NETSDK1152 "multiple publis h output files with the same relative path" with completely different paths coming from NuGet package #27536

PullRequests

Created

  • Update AOT test (#27334) #27574
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge 7.0.1xx rc1 to rc2 #27568
  • Use architecture specific DOTNET_ROOT veriable name #27566
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Eliminate duplicate inputs to ComputeBlazorBuildAssets #27561
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Add dependancy on Microsoft.TemplateEngine.Mocks #27556
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Add Dependancy on Microsoft.TemplateEngine.Mocks #27555
    Area-CodeFlow

Merged

  • Pass in reference assemblies to ApiCompat #27554
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Update AOT test #27334
    Area-ILLink
  • Add test for framework trimming warnings #27461
    Area-ILLink
  • Added `new` to the list of commands to track the second verb #27457
    area: dotnet new
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #27479
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Moved the options to new \ new create level #27455
    area: dotnet new
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1976836 #27439
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Get PublishRelease and PackRelease working in .*proj, Solutions #26808
    Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.1xx
  • Hot reload script injection improvements #27537
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Add Blazor SWA Baseline Mismatched Assets Logging #27542
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Removing default ProduceReferenceAssembly value for F# #26306
    Area-Infrastructure
